              [
                "CREATE TABLE team_person AS SELECT 'A' team, 'John' person\nUNION ALL  SELECT 'B' team,  'Smith' person\nUNION ALL  SELECT 'A' team,  'Walter' person\nUNION ALL  SELECT 'A' team,  'Louis' person\nUNION ALL  SELECT 'C' team,  'Elizabeth' person\nUNION ALL  SELECT 'B' team,  'Wayne' person;"
              ]
            ]
          },

      "e85c5956-c0a9-44b3-b2d2-ca7bdb181777": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550382588505,
          "id": "e85c5956-c0a9-44b3-b2d2-ca7bdb181777",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550382588505,
          "parent_id": "53d655c6-3c3d-4f0a-b3a7-71830f9f9602",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "SELECT @row_no := IF(@prev_val = t.team, @row_no + 1, 1) AS row_number\n   ,@prev_val := t.team AS team\n   ,t.person  \nFROM team_person t,\n  (SELECT @row_no := 0) x,\n  (SELECT @prev_val := '') y\nORDER BY t.team ASC,t.person DESC; \n\n+============+======+===========+\n| row_number | team |    person |\n+============+======+===========+\n|          1 |   A  |    Walter |\n+------------+------+-----------+\n|          2 |   A  |     Louis |\n+------------+------+-----------+\n|          3 |   A  |      John |\n+------------+------+-----------+\n|          1 |   B  |     Wayne |\n+------------+------+-----------+\n|          2 |   B  |     Smith |\n+------------+------+-----------+\n|          1 |   C  | Elizabeth |\n+------------+------+-----------+"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
      "edfa388f-c5a1-4157-ac19-5fcfef5497dc": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550382588504,
          "id": "edfa388f-c5a1-4157-ac19-5fcfef5497dc",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550382588504,
          "parent_id": "53d655c6-3c3d-4f0a-b3a7-71830f9f9602",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "SELECT @row_no := @row_no+1 AS row_number, team, person\nFROM team_person, (SELECT @row_no := 0) t;"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      }
    },
    "space": {}
  }
}
